Column.Name: yPixSize

Table.Name: RequiredStack
Table.Description: Contains details of default stack image products curated in the archive

Column.Name: programmeID
Column.Description: the unique programme ID

Column.Name: productID
Column.Description: A unique identifier assigned to each required stack product entry

Column.Name: name
Column.Description: Name of the stacked product

Column.Name: description
Column.Description: Description of the product

Column.Name: filterID
Column.Description: UID of combined filter (assigned in WSA: 1=Z,2=Y,3=J,4=H,5=K,6=H2,7=Br,8=blank)

Column.Name: ra
Column.Description: Right Ascension of stack centre

Column.Name: dec
Column.Description: Declination of stack centre

Column.Name: numberStk
Column.Description: Number of intermediate stacks. If default, stack all good quality stacks

Column.Name: maxSeeing
Column.Description: The maximum allowed seeing for intermediate stacks

Column.Name: maxStelEll
Column.Description: The maximum allowed stellar ellipticity for intermediate stacks

Column.Name: wcs
Column.Description: CASU stacking tool option to switch use of image WCS to register images (y/n; recommended value=y)

Column.Name: clip
Column.Description: CASU stacking tool option to perform 3-sigma (robustly estimated) clipping before stacking pixels (y/n; recommended value=y)

Column.Name: extractTool
Column.Description: Name of extraction tool to be used

Column.Name: nPixels
Column.Description: CASU/SEX source extraction tool option for minimum number of connected pixels in a detected source (recommended value=4)

Column.Name: threshold
Column.Description: CASU/SEX source extraction tool option for the isophotal analysis threshold (recommended value=1.5)

Column.Name: crowd
Column.Description: CASU source extraction tool option to switch on/off (1/0) crowded field analysis (recommended value=1)

Column.Name: rCore
Column.Description: CASU/SEX source extraction tool option for default profile fitting radius (recommended value=expected image FWHM)

Column.Name: nBlockSize
Column.Description: CASU/SEX source extraction tool option to override the default background blockdown size (=64, the recommended value)

Column.Name: dualFilterID
Column.Description: SEX extraction tool option to run in dual image mode UID of dual image filter (assigned in WSA: 1=Z,2=Y,3=J,4=H,5=K,6=H2,7=Br,8=blank)

Column.Name: fwhm
Column.Description: SEX source extraction tool option for mosaic FWHM

Column.Name: convFilter
Column.Description: SEX source extraction tool option - name of convolution filter to be used

Table.Name: Multiframe
Table.Description: Contains details of all multiframes stored in the archive

Column.Name: multiframeID
Column.Description: UID of the multiframe (assigned sequentially by the archive ingest process)

Column.Name: ukirtRunNo
Column.Description: Original UKIRT run number (from filename)

Column.Name: frameType
Column.Description: The type of multiframe (eg. stack|tile|mosaic|difference|calibration|interleaved etc).

Column.Name: cuEventID
Column.Description: UID of curation event giving rise to this record

Column.Name: julianDayNum
Column.Description: the Julian Day number of the UKIRT night

Column.Name: fileTimeStamp
Column.Description: Time stamp digits (from the original CASU directory name and file time stamp) for enforcing uniqueness

Column.Name: numDetectors
Column.Description: The number of "detectors" (=image extensions in FITS file)

Column.Name: filterID
Column.Description: UID of combined filter (assigned in WSA: 1=Z,2=Y,3=J,4=H,5=K,6=H2,7=Br,8=blank,9=1.205nbJ)

Column.Name: fileName
Column.Description: the filename for the multiframe, eg. server:/path/filename.fit

Column.Name: catName
Column.Description: the filename of the associated catalogue MEF, eg. server:/path/filename.fits

Column.Name: versionNum
Column.Description: a version number for this frame (if available)

Column.Name: frinID
Column.Description: UID of library calibration fringe frame

Column.Name: deprecated
Column.Description: Code for a current (=0) or deprecated (!=0) multiframe

Column.Name: newlyIngested
Column.Description: Curation flag for internal use only (0=no, 1=yes)

Column.Name: raMoon

Column.Name: decMoon

Column.Name: illumMoon
Column.Description: Illumination of the Moon

Column.Name: raMoonTopo

Column.Name: decMoonTopo
Column.Description: Apparent topocentric Declination of the Moon (including precession, nutation, and annual aberration)

Table.Name: Programme
Table.Description: Contains details of the WFCAM observation programmes

Column.Name: programmeID
Column.Description: UID of the archived programme coded as above

Column.Name: title
Column.Description: a short title for the programme, eg. "UKIDSS Large Area Survey"

Column.Name: description
Column.Description: a concise description of the programme

Column.Name: reference
Column.Description: a reference for the programme, eg. "http://www.ukidss.org/surveys/surveys.html"

Column.Name: propPeriod
Column.Description: the proprietory period for any data taken for this programme in months, e.g. 12 for open time.

Column.Name: dfsIDString
Column.Description: The description used within the data flow system (ie. the value of the appropriate FITS keyword)

Column.Name: catalogueSchema
Column.Description: Script file that describes the catalogue schema

Column.Name: detectionTable
Column.Description: Table name of detections

Column.Name: sourceTable
Column.Description: Table name of merged sources

Column.Name: listRemeasTable
Column.Description: Table name of individual passband list re-measurements

Column.Name: sourceRemeasTable
Column.Description: Table name of co-located list re-measurements

Column.Name: mergeLogTable
Column.Description: Table name of curation log for source merging

Column.Name: frameTable
Column.Description: Name of table containing frame metadata

Column.Name: detectorTable
Column.Description: Name of table containing frame detector metadata

Column.Name: frameSetTolerance
Column.Description: The match tolerance for different passband frames

Column.Name: pairingCriterion
Column.Description: The pairing criterion for associating detections into merged sources

Column.Name: detectionObjID
Column.Description: The attribute name(s) of the UID for detections

Column.Name: sourceObjID
Column.Description: The attribute name(s) of the UID for merged sources

Column.Name: rmOldFrameSetsSQL
Column.Description: SQL script name for deprecating old frame sets during source merging

Column.Name: adjacentFrameTolerance
Column.Description: The match tolerance for adjacent frames in the survey

Column.Name: neighboursSchema
Column.Description: Script file that describes the neighbour tables schema for this programme

Table.Name: PhotCalVers

Column.Description: the version number of the calibration

Column.Name: cuEventID

Column.Name: startDate
Column.Description: Date time of start time for this version of the calibration (MM-DD-YYYY)

Column.Name: endDate
Column.Description: Date time of end time for this version of the calibration (MM-DD-YYYY)

Table.Name: RequiredCurationTask
Table.Description: Contains the matrix of programmes and required curation tasks

Column.Description: the unique programme ID

Column.Name: cuID

Column.Description: is this task the final one before release (0=no; 1=yes)?

Column.Name: sequence
Column.Description: Indicates the order in which the tasks are to be executed

Table.Name: RequiredMosaic
Table.Description: Contains details of default mosaic image products curated in the archive

Column.Name: programmeID
Column.Description: the unique programme ID

Column.Name: productID
Column.Description: A unique identifier assigned to each required mosaic product entry

Column.Name: name
Column.Description: Name of the mosaiced product

Column.Name: description
Column.Description: Description of the product

Column.Name: filterID
Column.Description: UID of combined filter (assigned in WSA: 1=Z,2=Y,3=J,4=H,5=K,6=H2,7=Br,8=blank)

Column.Name: ra
Column.Description: Right Ascension of mosaic centre

Column.Name: dec
Column.Description: Declination of mosaic centre

Column.Name: raExtent
Column.Description: The angular extent in RA of the mosaic image

Column.Name: decExtent
Column.Description: The angular extent in Dec of the mosaic image

Column.Name: maxSeeing
Column.Description: The maximum allowed seeing for intermediate stacks

Column.Name: maxStelEll
Column.Description: The maximum allowed stellar ellipticity for intermediate stacks

Column.Name: mosaicTool
Column.Description: Name of mosaicing tool to be used

Column.Name: scrunch
Column.Description: CASU mosaic tool mandatory parameter to specifying the no. of pixels to rebin into one pixel in the output image (1=no rebinning)

Column.Name: projection
Column.Description: CASU mosaic tool option to specify output WCS projection type (TAN for gnomonic, ZPN for zenithal polynomial)

Column.Name: confLimit
Column.Description: CASU mosaic tool option to override the default 10% minimum confidence level for a contributing pixel

Column.Name: extractTool
Column.Description: Name of extraction tool to be used

Column.Name: nPixels
Column.Description: CASU/SEX source extraction tool option for minimum number of connected pixels in a detected source (recommended value=4)

Column.Name: threshold
Column.Description: CASU/SEX source extraction tool option for the isophotal analysis threshold (recommended value=1.5)

Column.Name: crowd
Column.Description: CASU source extraction tool option to switch on/off (1/0) crowded field analysis (recommended value=1)

Column.Name: rCore
Column.Description: CASU/SEX source extraction tool option for default profile fitting radius (recommended value=expected image FWHM)

Column.Name: nBlockSize
Column.Description: CASU/SEX source extraction tool option to override the default background blockdown size (=64, the recommended value)

Column.Name: dualFilterID
Column.Description: SEX extraction tool option to run in dual image mode UID of dual image filter (assigned in WSA: 1=Z,2=Y,3=J,4=H,5=K,6=H2,7=Br,8=blank)

Column.Name: fwhm
Column.Description: SEX source extraction tool option for mosaic FWHM

Column.Name: convFilter
Column.Description: SEX source extraction tool option - name of convolution filter to be used

Table.Name: ExternalSurveyTable
Table.Description: Contains information about the external surveys tables

Column.Name: surveyID
Column.Description: the unique identifier for the survey

Column.Name: extTableID
Column.Description: the unique table ID

Column.Description: Time of the completion of the whole task

Column.Name: rolledBack
Column.Description: Flag for roll-back of this event: 0=no, 1 = yes

Column.Description: Class flag from available measurements (1|0|-1|-2|-3|-9=galaxy|noise|stellar|probableStar|probableGalaxy|saturated)

Column.Name: pStar
Column.Description: Probability that the source is a star

Column.Name: pGalaxy
Column.Description: Probability that the source is a galaxy

Column.Name: pNoise
Column.Description: Probability that the source is noise

Column.Name: pSaturated
Column.Description: Probability that the source is saturated

Column.Name: eBV
Column.Description: The galactic dust extinction value measured from the Schlegel, Finkbeiner & Davis (1998) maps. This uses the correction given in Bonifacio, Monai & Beers (2000). This correction reduces the extinction value in regions of high extinction (E(B-V)>0.1)

Column.Name: aY
Column.Description: The galactic extinction correction in the Y band for extragalactic objects

Column.Name: aJ
Column.Description: The galactic extinction correction in the J band for extragalactic objects

Column.Name: aH
Column.Description: The galactic extinction correction in the H band for extragalactic objects

Column.Name: aK
Column.Description: The galactic extinction correction in the K band for extragalactic objects

Column.Description: Error in extended source Y mag (Petrosian)

Column.Description: Error in extended source Y mag (5.7 arcsec aperture diameter)

Column.Description: RMS of axes of ellipse fit in Y

Column.Name: yEll
Column.Description: 1-b/a, where a/b=semi-major/minor axes in Y

Column.Name: yPA
Column.Description: ellipse fit celestial orientation in Y

Column.Name: yErrBits
Column.Description: processing warning/error bitwise flags in Y

Column.Name: yDeblend
Column.Description: flag indicating parent/child relation in Y

Column.Name: yClass
Column.Description: discrete image classification flag in Y

Column.Description: N(0,1) stellarness-of-profile statistic in Y

Column.Name: yppErrBits
Column.Description: additional WFAU post-processing error bits in Y

Column.Name: ySeqNum
Column.Description: the running number of the Y detection

Column.Name: yObjID
Column.Description: the UID of the Y detection

Column.Name: yXi
Column.Description: Offset of Y detection from master position (east/-west)

Column.Name: yEta
Column.Description: Offset of Y detection from master position (north/-south)
